SageTVPlugin.Name: Remove Plugin and Dependencies
SageTVPlugin.Description: Adds the ability to completely uninstall a Plugin and all of its dependencies. Also provides the ability to search for and remove unused Plugins.
SageTVPlugin.Author: tmiranda
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes:
Version 0.6:
- Migrated hosting to BinTray. No change in functionality.
Beta 0.5:
- Fixed bug that caused needed dependencies to be marked as unneeded.
- Fixed bug that caused loglevel to always be set to WARN.
Beta 0.4 - First public beta.
